title: PLZ HELP ME
body:
So my account has been acting weird lately, i logged in one day and found i was in a game, WAT. i tried to reconnect but it said plz check your server connection, i pressed cancell, i went on op.gg and found there were like, idk 10 ranked troll games and i had been dropped alllll the way down to bronze 5, when i was previously bronze 2, with all my rp and ip wasted on ip boosts and tier 1 runes. so i changed the password, today i found i was in game AGAIN, even after the password change, but that seems to be all the "hacker" wants to do. play troll ranked games and drop my elo. any fiz for this? maybe its a friend who knows my password patterns?

MY CURRENT SUMMONER NAME ekk0l0c4t10n, oce server PLZ HELP MEH

NEW NEWS, THE "HACKER" JUST FINSHED A GAME, AND NOW MY CHAT IS RESTRICTED

replies.body: did you download anything that might be suspicious before your account got hacked? did you participate in the fake poolparty or bilgewater events? cause you might've downloaded a keylogger or something.
Why is this on miscellaneous board should be on Help & support board.

Dude, oka, the first ting that YOU should NOT do, is access your account, because if you do, there is more of a chance that your 'Hacker' will be in game.
Dont buy ANYTHING with RP, actually dont get any rp.
The best thing to do is sadly to start a new account...
If u cant be bothered getting a new account, then go ask riot for help.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us this is a really good site. just give full details and wait a day or 2 and they should send an email asap

I did that, a lot...
They should reply asap! Within like one - two hours, they have a lot of members on stand by
